description.message: TrackChanges will compare what has changed since the page has loaded, then generate a set of developer friendly files.

browser_action.message: Open inspector, make a change and save the summary.

@description_html.message: TrackChanges will compare what has changed since the page has loaded, then generate a set of developer friendly files that can be easily shared.

@generated_by_html.message: This snapshot was generated by TrackChanges for Google Chrome on

@sponsored_by_html.message: Enjoying TrackChanges? Leave me a review.

@no_diff_html.message:

Consider unchecking 'Ignore Dynamic Elements' and 'Ignore Commonly Injected Elements' for a more complete comparison.

@options_summary_html.message:
Feedback

Thank you for installing TrackChanges! I would love to hear your feedback, please send me an email.

@option_ignore_commonly_injected_element.message: Scripts like Intercom and Google Maps in the DOM.

@option_ignore_dynamic_elements_descript.message: TrackChanges will ignore parts of the DOM it knows are commonly changed by JavaScript, such as carousels.

@option_download_snapshot_immediately_de.message: After a snapshot is created, download the summary as a Zip file.

@options_reset_trackchanges_summary_desc.message: If you're experiencing errors, resetting everything back to a clean slate might fix everything.

@options_reset_trackchanges_done.message: TrackChanges has been reset, now reload the extension ðŸ¤˜ ðŸš€

@popup_thanks_html.message: Thank you for for installing TrackChanges! To get started:

@popup_how_it_works_html.message:
1. Open the Chrome DevTools Elements panel on a page you'd like the edit, by right clicking and selecting 'Inspect'
  2. Make changes to the page
  3. Visit the TrackChanges panel
  4. Click 'Create Snapshot', to create a summary of what you just changed
  5. You'll receive a developer friendly summary of what was just changed

@popup_help_me_html.message: I'm super excited to know your thoughts, be sure to send me an email or leave a review in the Chrome Store.
